title: ISic000776. I.Sicily inscription 000776
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) M(anibus)
A(uli) Hirti Liberalis ( vac. 4) vixit ann(is)
XXVIII me(n)s(ibus) XI Claudia Sozo-
mene mater fil(io) pientissimo

Apparatus criticus

Text of I.Lipara

English translation

To the shades of the underworld, of Aulus Hirtius Liberalis. He lived 28 years, 11 months. Claudia Sozomene, his mother, (set this up) for her most dutiful son

commentary

bibliography
